snippet: Juan Monteverde and his law firm, Faruqi & Faruqi, filed a counterclaim in Federal District Court in Manhattan on Tuesday, accusing a junior lawyer of defamation and damaging his and the firm’s reputation.
abstract: Juan Monteverde and his law firm, Faruqi & Faruqi, filed a counterclaim in Federal District Court in Manhattan on Tuesday, accusing a junior lawyer of defamation and damaging his and the firm’s reputation.

headline.main: Law Firm Partner Accused of Sexual Harassment Fires Back
headline.print_headline: Counterclaim Is Filed In Sex Harassment Suit
